text: Rudamina is a village in Vilnius district municipality, Vilnius County, east Lithuania. As of the 2001 census, the town had a population of 3937 people. The village has a Catholic church. In 2010 the smaller village of Čekėnai was united with Rudamina, the combined village having a population of approximately 4300. The village has 2 gymnasiums, Rudamina school of arts, 2 kindergartens, Vilnius district central library, post office (ZIP code: 13031). ==References== Category:Villages in Vilnius County Category:Vilnius District Municipality Category:Vilensky Uyezd
title: Rudamina (Vilnius)
